sparql.query: PREFIX adams: <https://adams-medi.000webhostapp.com/adams.owl#>SELECT * WHERE { ?adams adams:Name ?Name ; adams:Description ?Description ; adams:Synonyms ?Synonyms ; adams:Type ?Type ; VALUES ?Type {"Symptoms"} }
